greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the sum of first n terms of A001285 (Thue-Morse sequence).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: G.f.: x*(3/(1 - x)^2 - Product_{k>=1} (1 - x^(2^k)))/2. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 03 2019
mathematica: A001285 = Table[ Mod[ Sum[ Mod[ Binomial[n, k], 2], {k, 0, n}], 3], {n, 0, 61}]; Accumulate[A001285] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 25 2012 *)
Join[{0}, Accumulate[1 + ThueMorse /@ Range[0, 100]]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 18 2019, from version 10.2 *)
program: (PARI) first(n)=my(v=vector(n)); v[1]=1; for(k=2,n,v[k]=if(k%2,v[k\2+1]-v[k\2])+k\2*3); concat(0,v) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 09 2016
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
